questionTitle: Which of the following layer of Wolf platform architecture is depicted in the following figure?
questionExplanation: In Wolf, the data and transaction management conforms to the business rules you create.

questionOption1: SquareSpace is used in major Websites and organizes vast amounts of information
questionOption2: LongJump creates browser-based Web applications that are database-enabled
questionOption3: LongJump extends Python and uses a Model-View-Controller architecture (MVC) for its framework
questionExplanation: LongJump comes with an Object Model Viewer.

questionTitle: Which of the following instrumentation tool displays the real-time parameters of your application in a visual form in AppBase?
questionExplanation: Applications that you create are deployed with the AppBase Application Revision Management console.

questionTitle: Which of the following lets you sort, aggregate, display, and format report information based on the data in your application?
questionExplanation: The applications you create in AppBase may be integrated with Amazon S3 Web Services (storage).

questionOption1: LongJump comes with a security policy engine that has user and group privileges
questionOption2: Squarespace lets you create beautiful hosted Websites with a variety of capabilities with visual tools alone
questionExplanation: The applications are built using visual tools and deployed on the hosted infrastructure.

questionTitle: Which of the following object database has the ability to create rich data objects and create relationships between them?
questionExplanation: Presentation builder allows you to drag and drop visual controls for creating Web forms and data entry screens and to include the logic necessary to automate what the user sees.

questionTitle: Which of the following technologies are used in LongJumpâ€™s PaaS?
questionExplanation: Its development environment is based on Java and uses REST/SOAP APIs.

questionTitle: Which of the following is a WYSIWYG web builder?
questionExplanation: WaveMaker is a visual rapid application development environment for creating Java-based Web and cloud Ajax applications.

questionTitle: ___________ tool is used to create business logic for your application.
questionExplanation: With it, you can manage workflow, integrate modules, create rules, and validate data.

questionTitle: Which of the following architecture is shown in the following figure?
questionExplanation: AppBase includes a set of different tools for building applications.
